original: LUNDBERG, Verner, Skohandlare, Nora, f Järnboås, öbr l, 23/8 92 av garverifabr Gustaf L o Kristina Johansson, gm Anna Johansson. Folksk. Inneh m brod Gustaf L fma G Lundberg sko- & läderhdl (grund 89).
translated: LUNDBERG, Verner, Shoemaker, Nora, born in Järnboås, unmarried, born on August 23, 1892, to leather factory owner Gustaf L and Kristina Johansson, married to Anna Johansson. Completed elementary school. Brother of Gustaf L, partner in G Lundberg shoe and leather store (established in 1889).

memberOf.name: G Lundberg shoe and leather store

career.workplace: G Lundberg shoe and leather store
